ILLEGAL_MESSAGE: Illegal game found. Please buy, install the game and launch at least once.
RAID_TEAM_DEAD: Your team is Dead! You can quit now using the F8 Key.
RAID_PLAYER_DEAD_SOLO: You are Dead! You can quit now using the F8 Key.
RAID_PLAYER_DEAD_HOST: You are Dead! Please wait other player(s) to extract or died.
RAID_PLAYER_DEAD_CLIENT: You are Dead! Please wait for the game to end or quit now using the F8 Key.
RAID_TEAM_EXTRACTED: Your team has extracted! You can quit now using the F8 Key.
RAID_PLAYER_EXTRACTED_HOST: You have extracted! Please wait other player(s) to extract or died.
RAID_PLAYER_EXTRACTED_CLIENT: You have extracted! Please wait for all players to extract or quit now using the F8 Key.
P2P_WARNING_LABEL: Warning: P2P is an experimental feature. You may experience issues in this mode.
